sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Retrieves information about the permissions for specified stack ID or IAM user.

Inputs:

  • Region - Amazon region.
  • IAM User ARN - ARN of IAM user.
  • Stack ID - ID of stack.

Outputs:

  • Permissions - Object containing information about permissions .
    • Allow Ssh
    • Allow Sudo
    • Level
    • Stack ID
    • IAM User ARN

  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages:

  • Unable to find stack with ID.

(For information about the errors that are common to all actions, see Common Errors).

To use this action, the corresponding AWS OpsWorks connection and credential must be created and associated with the AWS OpsWorks Connection & Credential alias.Learn More

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
Retrieves information about the permissions for specified stack ID or IAM user.

Inputs:

  • Region - Amazon region.
  • IAM User ARN - ARN of IAM user.
  • Stack ID - ID of stack.

Outputs:

  • Permissions - Object containing information about permissions .
    • Allow Ssh
    • Allow Sudo
    • Level
    • Stack ID
    • IAM User ARN

  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages:

  • Unable to find stack with ID.

(For information about the errors that are common to all actions, see Common Errors).

To use this action, the corresponding AWS OpsWorks connection and credential must be created and associated with the AWS OpsWorks Connection & Credential alias.Learn More
